name: Copyright shortcode creator VICT
author: Voordelig ICT

sections.description:
Shortcodes to display the current year, copyright logo and/or site name. You can choose from several variants by means of different shortcodes.
Simply add the shortcode where you want the copyright notice to appear, this can be in a template, in the WordPress customizer or in a page or post. Don’t forget the [ ] brackets!

1. [vict_y] displays the current year
2. [vict_nc] displays the website name and copyright logo
3. [vict_ncy] displays the website name, copyright logo and year
4. [vict_ncyr] displays the website name, copyright logo, year and “all rights reserved”

See attached images to see exactly what the different shortcodes look like on your website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the \\’/wp-content/plugins/\\’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins utility directly.
  2. Activate the plugin from the plug-in menu in WordPress.
  3. Add the shortcode wherever needed.
sections.faq:
Q: Which shortcode do I use?

A: See the plugin description. The is an explanation which shortcode shows what.

Q: Where can I use the shortcodes?

A: Wherever you want. In the header, the footer or in a post. Wherever you can add text, you can add this shortcode.
